div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 560 Selci (Selce), near Shkodër, Albania, (937) 1870? Burial: 2nd cent. B.C. (T) Contents: 3 AR, 35 AE. Pot hoard Apollonia: 1 dr. Dyrrhachium: 2 dr.; 14 AE Lissus: 1 AE Scodra: 13 AE Genthius: 6 AE Unc.: 1 AE Disposition: Oxford † Evans, NG 1880, pp. 269-88, illus. Islami, Studia Albanica 1 (1966), pp. 225-51, passim
